content.question: A <math alttext="100 decimal point gram" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>100</mn><mtext>.</mtext><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></math> sample of a substance decomposes so that <math alttext="25 grams" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>25</mn><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi></math> of the original substance remains after <math alttext="40 decimal point" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>40</mn><mtext>.</mtext></math> seconds. If the decomposition is first order, which of the following is the rate constant, <math alttext="k" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>k</mi></math>, of the decomposition reaction?

choices.label: <math alttext="0.017, per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mo> </mo><mn>0.017</mn><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mpadded><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mpadded></msup></math>

<math alttext="0.035, per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mo> </mo><mn>0.035</mn><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mpadded><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mpadded></msup></math>

<math alttext="1.4, per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mo> </mo><mn>1.4</mn><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mpadded><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mpadded></msup></math>

<math alttext="20 decimal point, per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>20</mn><mtext>.</mtext><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mpadded><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mpadded></msup></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="0.035, per second" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mo> </mo><mn>0.035</mn><mspace width="0.25em"></mspace><msup><mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi><mpadded><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mpadded></msup></math>

skill.text: 5.F: Calculate, estimate, or predict an unknown quantity from known quantities by selecting and following a logical computational pathway and attending to precision (e.g., performing dimensional analysis and attending to significant figures).
